params.sqrtPriceX96: The initial price of the pool, as a sqrt(ratio) Q64.96 value

returns.feeProtocol: The protocol fee for both tokens of the pool
returns.observationCardinality: The current maximum number of observations stored in the pool
returns.observationCardinalityNext: The next maximum number of observations
returns.observationIndex: The index of the last oracle observation
returns.sqrtPriceX96: The current price of the pool as a sqrt(token1/token0) Q64.96 value
returns.tick: The current tick of the pool
returns.unlocked: Whether the pool is currently locked to reentrancy

params.amountSpecified: The amount of the swap, which implicitly configures the swap as exact input (positive), or exact output (negative)
params.data: Any data to be passed through to the callback
params.recipient: The address to receive the output of the swap
params.zeroForOne: The direction of the swap, true for token0 to token1, false for token1 to token0

returns.amount0: The delta of the balance of token0 of the pool
returns.amount1: The delta of the balance of token1 of the pool

liquidity().notice: The currently in range liquidity available to the pool

slot0().notice: The 0th storage slot in the pool stores many values, and is exposed as a single method to save gas

swap(address,bool,int256,uint160,bytes).notice: Swap token0 for token1, or token1 for token0
